title: Inside the Making of ‘The Righteous Gemstones’ With Danny McBride, David Gordon Greene, and Jody Hill | The Watch
description:
Danny McBride, David Gordon Greene, and Jody Hill, the creators of HBO’s ‘The Righteous Gemstones,’ join the show to talk about their inspirations for the show (7:31), comedy taking on religion (12:56), and what it’s like to work on multiple projects as a group (17:51).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Danny McBride, David Gordon Greene, and Jody Hill

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
